description.value:
Unlock: When you reach 6th level overall you may take the ability below.

When you have @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion}, you suffer its effects as if you had half as many levels of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} (rounded down). Whenever you remove @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} as part of a long rest, you can remove an additional level of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion}.

system.requirements: 2nd level overall and have at least one level in a Martial class
